name: Fruitful Memories
description:
After the unexpected death of a beloved fruit, the three fruits closest to them must perform the traditional village ritual. Together, they plant the seed of the fruit that just died in the Forest of Memories and, remembering moments and memories they spent together, help the Tree of their life to grow. 

*This is a Hidden Objects game about death and memories, where each of the objects found represents a memory of the character.*

Catharina Barbachan: - Game Design - Tech Art
Charlotte Garcia: - Game Producer
Clara Ishikawa: - Game Design - Concept Art - Character Design - Level Design
Daniel Fróes: - Game Design - Developer - Level Design
Franco Simões: - Game Design - Narrative Design
Lita Hayata - Game Design - Concept Art - Character Design - Level Design
Nayara Terumi: - Game Design - Concept Art - Character Design - 3D Modelling
